channel.title: Private Bills
channel.description: A list of all private bills for the current session

item.title: University of London
item.description: A Bill to make new provision for the making of statutes for the University of London; and for related purposes.

item.title: Middle Level
item.description: A Bill to amend and update the powers of the Middle Level Commissioners to regulate navigation on the Middle Level of the Fens in the city of Peterborough and the counties of Cambridgeshire and Norfolk; to make further provision as to the regulation of navigation on those waterways; to make other provision as to the Commissioners; and for connected purposes.

item.title: High Speed Rail (West Midlands - Crewe)
item.description: A Bill to make provision for a railway between a junction with Phase One of High Speed 2, near Fradley Wood in Staffordshire, and a junction with the West Coast Main Line near Crewe in Cheshire; and for connected purposes.

item.title: City of London Corporation (Open Spaces)
item.description: To make provision relating to the public open spaces under the management and control of the City of London Corporation; and for related purposes.

item.title: New Southgate Cemetery
item.description: To confer powers upon New Southgate Cemetery and Crematorium Limited and the National Spiritual Assembly of the Bah√°'is of the United Kingdom to extinguish rights of burial and disturb human remains in respect of New Southgate Cemetery for the purpose of increasing the space for interments; and for connected purposes.

item.title: Richmond Burgage Pastures
item.description: A Bill to amend certain provisions of the Richmond Burgage Pastures Act 1853.
